vote.motion-ch: 《2017年醫生註冊(修訂)條例草案》 - 二讀

vote.motion-ch: 《2017年醫生註冊(修訂)條例草案》 - 三讀
郭家麒議員對邵家輝議員的「拉動內需 擴大客源」議案作出的修正案
vote.motion-en: AMENDMENT BY DR HON KWOK KA-KI TO HON SHIU KA-FAI'S MOTION ON “STIMULATING INTERNAL DEMAND AND OPENING UP NEW VISITOR SOURCES”

vote.motion-ch: 胡志偉議員對邵家輝議員就「拉動內需 擴大客源」所提，經姚思榮議員及田北辰議員修正的議案，作出的修正案
vote.motion-en: AMENDMENT BY HON WU CHI-WAI TO HON SHIU KA-FAI'S MOTION ON “STIMULATING INTERNAL DEMAND AND OPENING UP NEW VISITOR SOURCES” AS AMENDED BY HON YIU SI-WING AND HON MICHAEL TIEN

vote.motion-ch: 林卓廷議員對邵家輝議員就「拉動內需 擴大客源」所提，經姚思榮議員、田北辰議員及胡志偉議員修正的議案，作出的修正案
vote.motion-en: AMENDMENT BY HON LAM CHEUK-TING TO HON SHIU KA-FAI'S MOTION ON “STIMULATING INTERNAL DEMAND AND OPENING UP NEW VISITOR SOURCES” AS AMENDED BY HON YIU SI-WING, HON MICHAEL TIEN AND HON WU CHI-WAI

vote.motion-ch: 邵家輝議員動議，經姚思榮議員、田北辰議員及胡志偉議員修正的「拉動內需 擴大客源」議案
vote.motion-en: MOTION MOVED BY HON SHIU KA-FAI ON “STIMULATING INTERNAL DEMAND AND OPENING UP NEW VISITOR SOURCES” AS AMENDED BY HON YIU SI-WING, HON MICHAEL TIEN AND HON WU CHI-WAI
